subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: A shot off a patio in a hospitality area helped Phil Mickelson escape early elimination, while Rory McIlroy and Rickie Fowler were also having trouble after two rounds.
snippet: A shot off a patio in a hospitality area helped Phil Mickelson escape early elimination, while Rory McIlroy and Rickie Fowler were also having trouble after two rounds.
